DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of regular consumption of probiotic tablets in preventing illnesses in Finnish healthy adults attending military service.
DOC.brief_title: Probiotics and Infections in Conscripts in Military Service
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults attending military service in July 2012 and healthy adults attending reserve office school in October 2012 Regular use of oral corticosteroids Regular consumption (over 3 times a week) of probiotic bacteria containing products 3 weeks before intervention
